title: The Unlikely Heroics of Kevin Coleman
summary: Kevin Coleman, an 80-year-old with a passion for programming and knitting, discovers his unique superpowers, faces challenges, and saves his community over the span of a week.
summaryGerman: Kevin Coleman, ein 80-jähriger mit einer Leidenschaft für Programmieren und Stricken, entdeckt seine einzigartigen Superkräfte, stellt sich Herausforderungen und rettet innerhalb einer Woche seine Gemeinde.
summaryDutch: Kevin Coleman, een 80-jarige met een passie voor programmeren en breien, ontdekt zijn unieke superkrachten, gaat uitdagingen aan en redt zijn gemeenschap in de loop van een week.
summaryFrench: Kevin Coleman, un octogénaire passionné de programmation et de tricot, découvre ses superpouvoirs uniques, fait face à des défis et sauve sa communauté en l'espace d'une semaine.

story.text: Kevin discovers he can manipulate yarn with his mind while knitting a scarf.
Intrigued by his newfound powers, Kevin experiments by coding a program to enhance his control.
Kevin uses his skills to quietly fix local issues, like patching potholes with magically knitted asphalt.
Rumors of a 'Knitting Wizard' begin to circulate, making Kevin both excited and nervous.
A local news crew tries to uncover the identity of the mysterious hero, putting Kevin under unwanted spotlight.
Determined to remain anonymous, Kevin cleverly avoids detection by creating decoys with his knitting.
Embracing his role, Kevin hosts a community event teaching kids to knit, secretly integrating life lessons on goodness and humility.

ending: With yarn and code, Kevin weaved not only materials but also the hearts of his community.
moral: No matter the age, you can still make a significant impact on the world around you.
